description: All the comfort and fit of your favorite Zs, now in a weather-ready Chelsea silhouette. The Paonia collection is the closest fit you will get to a Z sandal made in a closed-toe year round style. An upper built from waterproof, waxy suede leather keeps the elements out, while our Gold-Rated sourcing keeps the environmental standard that defines our commitment to sustainability.
name: Chaco Paonia Chelsea - Mens
